Request      

DELETE api/installments/{installment}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

installment   integer   

The installment. Example: 1

id   string   

معرف القسط. Example: 1

تحصيل أقساط (دفع) عملية سداد مبلغ للأقساط المحددة، يتم توزيع المبلغ تلقائياً على الأقساط المختارة.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/installment-payments/pay" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"installment_ids\": [
        1,
        2
    ],
    \"amount\": 1000,
    \"payment_method_id\": 1,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"installment_plan_id\": \"quis\",
    \"notes\": \"et\",
    \"paid_at\": \"2023-10-25 14:00:00\",
    \"reference_number\": \"exercitationem\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/installment-payments/pay"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "installment_ids": [
        1,
        2
    ],
    "amount": 1000,
    "payment_method_id": 1,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "installment_plan_id": "quis",
    "notes": "et",
    "paid_at": "2023-10-25 14:00:00",
    "reference_number": "exercitationem"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/installment-payments/pay

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

installment_ids   string[]   

معرفات الأقساط المراد دفعها.

amount   number   

المبلغ المدفوع إجمالاً. Example: 1000

payment_method_id   integer   

معرف طريقة الدفع. Example: 1

cash_box_id   integer  optional  

معرف الخزنة (اختياري، يستخدم الافتراضي إذا لم يحدد). Example: 1

installment_plan_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the installment_plans table. Example: quis

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

notes   string  optional  

Example: et

paid_at   datetime  optional  

تاريخ الدفع. Example: 2023-10-25 14:00:00

reference_number   string  optional  

Example: exercitationem

04. نظام المنتجات

إنشاء منتج جديد متكامل يسمح بإنشاء سجل المنتج الأساسي مع متغيراته (Variants) وسجلات المخزون الأولية في طلب واحد.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/products" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"آيفون 15 بروميجا\",
    \"product_type\": \"service\",
    \"require_stock\": false,
    \"is_downloadable\": true,
    \"download_url\": \"http:\\/\\/www.hudson.com\\/quia-laudantium-odit-quo-ut\",
    \"download_limit\": 15,
    \"validity_days\": 58,
    \"expires_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:49\",
    \"delivery_instructions\": \"beatae\",
    \"image_ids\": [
        11
    ],
    \"primary_image_id\": 6,
    \"published_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:49\",
    \"desc\": \"eos\",
    \"desc_long\": \"eum\",
    \"category_id\": 3,
    \"active\": true,
    \"featured\": true,
    \"returnable\": true,
    \"variants\": [
        {
            \"stocks\": [
                {
                    \"id\": 19,
                    \"quantity\": 53,
                    \"warehouse_id\": \"dolorem\"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/products"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "آيفون 15 بروميجا",
    "product_type": "service",
    "require_stock": false,
    "is_downloadable": true,
    "download_url": "http:\/\/www.hudson.com\/quia-laudantium-odit-quo-ut",
    "download_limit": 15,
    "validity_days": 58,
    "expires_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:49",
    "delivery_instructions": "beatae",
    "image_ids": [
        11
    ],
    "primary_image_id": 6,
    "published_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:49",
    "desc": "eos",
    "desc_long": "eum",
    "category_id": 3,
    "active": true,
    "featured": true,
    "returnable": true,
    "variants": [
        {
            "stocks": [
                {
                    "id": 19,
                    "quantity": 53,
                    "warehouse_id": "dolorem"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/products

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم المنتج. Example: آيفون 15 بروميجا

product_type   string   

Example: service

Must be one of:
  • physical
  • digital
  • service
  • subscription
require_stock   boolean   

Example: false

is_downloadable   boolean  optional  

This field is required when product_type is digital. Example: true

download_url   string  optional  

Example: http://www.hudson.com/quia-laudantium-odit-quo-ut

download_limit   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 15

license_keys   object  optional  
validity_days   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 58

expires_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:49

delivery_instructions   string  optional  

Example: beatae

image_ids   integer[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

primary_image_id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table. Example: 6

published_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:49

desc   string  optional  

Example: eos

desc_long   string  optional  

Example: eum

category_id   integer   

معرف القسم. Example: 3

brand_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the brands table.

active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

featured   boolean  optional  

Example: true

returnable   boolean  optional  

Example: true

variants   string[]   

مصفوفة المتغيرات (الأحجام، الألوان، إلخ).
id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the product_variants table. Example: 7

retail_price   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 14

wholesale_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 27

purchase_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 41

profit_margin   number  optional  

Example: 1

tax   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 10

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 13

stocks   object[]  optional  

This field is required when require_stock is true.
id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the stocks table. Example: 19

quantity   integer   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 53

warehouse_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the warehouses table. Example: dolorem

image_ids   integer[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

primary_image_id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table. Example: 6

*   object  optional  
retail_price   number  optional  

سعر البيع القطاعي. Example: 1500

wholesale_price   number  optional  

سعر الجملة. Example: 1350

stocks   string[]  optional  

مصفوفة المخزون لكل مخزن.
*   object  optional  
quantity   integer  optional  

الكمية الأولية. Example: 10

warehouse_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستودع. Example: 1

عرض تفاصيل منتج محدد جلب بيانات المنتج بالكامل (الاسم، الوصف، المتغيرات، والمخزون المتاح بكل مستودع).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/products/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/products/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
 "success": true,
 "data": { "id": 1, "name": "آيفون", "variants": [...] },
 "message": "تم جلب بيانات المنتج بنجاح"
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/products/{product_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

product_id   integer   

The ID of the product. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات منتج تعديل بيانات المنتج الأساسية أو تحديث المتغيرات والمخزون المرتبط بها.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/products/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"tptbyzyuubofo\",
    \"product_type\": \"service\",
    \"require_stock\": false,
    \"is_downloadable\": true,
    \"download_url\": \"http:\\/\\/erdman.biz\\/omnis-optio-est-quis-ratione-harum-quia-culpa.html\",
    \"download_limit\": 45,
    \"validity_days\": 8,
    \"expires_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:49\",
    \"delivery_instructions\": \"sit\",
    \"image_ids\": [
        3
    ],
    \"primary_image_id\": 3,
    \"slug\": \"dhoy\",
    \"published_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:49\",
    \"desc\": \"culpa\",
    \"desc_long\": \"nesciunt\",
    \"active\": true,
    \"featured\": false,
    \"returnable\": true,
    \"variants\": [
        {
            \"id\": 5,
            \"retail_price\": 83,
            \"wholesale_price\": 70,
            \"purchase_price\": 53,
            \"profit_margin\": 0,
            \"image\": \"yfpxrunln\",
            \"weight\": 70,
            \"dimensions\": \"gujgsvjqhzcps\",
            \"tax\": 16,
            \"discount\": 20,
            \"min_quantity\": 41,
            \"status\": \"inactive\",
            \"image_ids\": [
                10
            ],
            \"primary_image_id\": 19,
            \"stocks\": [
                {
                    \"quantity\": 32,
                    \"reserved\": 67,
                    \"expiry\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:49\",
                    \"status\": \"available\",
                    \"batch\": \"eiyewequnmltkh\",
                    \"cost\": 11,
                    \"loc\": \"izljnhqnrjoodcojppjq\"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/products/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "tptbyzyuubofo",
    "product_type": "service",
    "require_stock": false,
    "is_downloadable": true,
    "download_url": "http:\/\/erdman.biz\/omnis-optio-est-quis-ratione-harum-quia-culpa.html",
    "download_limit": 45,
    "validity_days": 8,
    "expires_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:49",
    "delivery_instructions": "sit",
    "image_ids": [
        3
    ],
    "primary_image_id": 3,
    "slug": "dhoy",
    "published_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:49",
    "desc": "culpa",
    "desc_long": "nesciunt",
    "active": true,
    "featured": false,
    "returnable": true,
    "variants": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "retail_price": 83,
            "wholesale_price": 70,
            "purchase_price": 53,
            "profit_margin": 0,
            "image": "yfpxrunln",
            "weight": 70,
            "dimensions": "gujgsvjqhzcps",
            "tax": 16,

                    "cost": 11,
                    "loc": "izljnhqnrjoodcojppjq"
                }
            ]

    ]
};

Example: service

  • physical
  • digital
  • service
  • subscription
require_stock   boolean  optional  

Example: false

Example: true

download_limit   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 45

license_keys   object  optional  
validity_days   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 8

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:49

Example: sit

The id of an existing record in the images table.

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: dhoy

desc_long   string  optional  

Example: nesciunt

The id of an existing record in the brands table.

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

featured   boolean  optional  

Example: false

returnable   boolean  optional  

Example: true

variants   object[]  optional  

يجب أن يحتوي الحقل value على الأقل على 1 عناصر.
id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the product_variants table. Example: 5

retail_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 83

wholesale_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 70

purchase_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 53

profit_margin   number  optional  

Example: 0

image   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: yfpxrunln

weight   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 70

dimensions   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gujgsvjqhzcps

tax   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 16

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 20

min_quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 41

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • discontinued
created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

image_ids   integer[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

primary_image_id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table. Example: 19

attributes   object[]  optional  
attribute_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the attributes table.

attribute_value_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the attribute_values table.

stocks   object[]   

يجب أن يحتوي الحقل value على الأقل على 1 عناصر.
id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the stocks table.

quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 32

reserved   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 67

expiry   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:49

status   string  optional  

Example: available

Must be one of:
  • available
  • unavailable
  • expired
batch   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: eiyewequnmltkh

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 11

warehouse_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the warehouses table.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

updated_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

حذف منتج حذف المنتج وكافة المتغيرات وسجلات المخزون المرتبطة به بشكل نهائي.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/products/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/products/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

عرض تفاصيل سمة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/attributes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/attributes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private

access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

Request      

GET api/attributes/{attribute}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

attribute   integer   

The attribute. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات وقيم سمة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/attributes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"mtnqnohodmztryq\",
    \"value\": \"tnonxback\",
    \"company_id\": \"adipisci\",
    \"created_by\": \"id\",
    \"values\": [
        {
            \"name\": \"nwxbsafvqhxqxqmiglujwvkfn\",
            \"color\": \"bjscdbq\"
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/attributes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "mtnqnohodmztryq",
    "value": "tnonxback",
    "company_id": "adipisci",
    "created_by": "id",
    "values": [
        {
            "name": "nwxbsafvqhxqxqmiglujwvkfn",
            "color": "bjscdbq"
        }
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/attributes/{attribute}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

attribute   integer   

The attribute. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: mtnqnohodmztryq

value   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: tnonxback

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: adipisci

created_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: id

values   object[]  optional  
id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the attribute_values table.

name   string  optional  

This field is required when values is present. يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: nwxbsafvqhxqxqmiglujwvkfn

color   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: bjscdbq

حذف سمة بالكامل

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/attributes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/attributes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/attributes/{attribute}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

attribute   integer   

The attribute. Example: 1

إضافة متغير لمنتج إنشاء تشكيلة جديدة (مثلاً لون أو مقاس معين) لمنتج موجود مسبقاً.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"barcode\": \"autem\",
    \"sku\": \"APP-IPHN15-RED\",
    \"retail_price\": 1200,
    \"wholesale_price\": 6,
    \"profit_margin\": 11,
    \"image\": \"k\",
    \"weight\": 16,
    \"dimensions\": \"gffw\",
    \"tax\": 3,
    \"discount\": 33,
    \"status\": \"discontinued\",
    \"product_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"dolores\",
    \"created_by\": \"dolore\",
    \"attributes\": [
        {
            \"attribute_id\": \"voluptas\",
            \"attribute_value_id\": \"aut\"
        }
    ],
    \"stocks\": [
        {
            \"warehouse_id\": \"voluptatem\",
            \"quantity\": 54,
            \"min_quantity\": 59,
            \"cost\": 28
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "barcode": "autem",
    "sku": "APP-IPHN15-RED",
    "retail_price": 1200,
    "wholesale_price": 6,
    "profit_margin": 11,
    "image": "k",
    "weight": 16,
    "dimensions": "gffw",
    "tax": 3,
    "discount": 33,
    "status": "discontinued",
    "product_id": 1,
    "company_id": "dolores",
    "created_by": "dolore",
    "attributes": [
        {
            "attribute_id": "voluptas",
            "attribute_value_id": "aut"
        }
    ],
    "stocks": [
        {
            "warehouse_id": "voluptatem",
            "quantity": 54,
            "min_quantity": 59,
            "cost": 28
        }
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/product-variants

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

barcode   string  optional  

Example: autem

sku   string  optional  

رمز SKU الفريد. Example: APP-IPHN15-RED

retail_price   number  optional  

سعر البيع. Example: 1200

wholesale_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 6

profit_margin   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 11

image   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: k

weight   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 16

dimensions   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gffw

tax   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 3

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 33

status   string   

Example: discontinued

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • discontinued
product_id   integer   

معرف المنتج الأم. Example: 1

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: dolores

created_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: dolore

attributes   object[]  optional  
attribute_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the attributes table. Example: voluptas

attribute_value_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the attribute_values table. Example: aut

stocks   object[]  optional  
warehouse_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the warehouses table. Example: voluptatem

quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 54

min_quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 59

cost   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 28

بحث متقدم في التشكيلات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/product-variants/search-by-product?search=ipsa" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/search-by-product"
);

const params = {
    "search": "ipsa",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/product-variants/search-by-product

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

search   string  optional  

نص البحث. Example: ipsa

عرض متغير محدد جلب تفاصيل تشكيلة معينة شاملة المخزون والخصائص الفنية.

    --get "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

تحديث متغير

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"product_id\": \"omnis\",
    \"barcode\": \"zj\",
    \"sku\": \"hvoyhel\",
    \"retail_price\": 60,
    \"wholesale_price\": 6,
    \"profit_margin\": 7,
    \"image\": \"lotdhskljfikuavh\",
    \"weight\": 66,
    \"dimensions\": \"dsyuwkqgrgzhjubahgdrnpz\",
    \"tax\": 19,
    \"discount\": 79,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"attributes\": [
        {
            \"id\": 12
        }
    ],
    \"stocks\": [
        {
            \"id\": 14,
            \"quantity\": 76,
            \"min_quantity\": 3,
            \"cost\": 65
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "product_id": "omnis",
    "barcode": "zj",
    "sku": "hvoyhel",
    "retail_price": 60,
    "wholesale_price": 6,
    "profit_margin": 7,
    "image": "lotdhskljfikuavh",
    "weight": 66,
    "dimensions": "dsyuwkqgrgzhjubahgdrnpz",
    "tax": 19,
    "discount": 79,
    "status": "inactive",
    "attributes": [
        {
            "id": 12
        }
    ],
    "stocks": [
        {
            "id": 14,
            "quantity": 76,
            "min_quantity": 3,
            "cost": 65
        }
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/product-variants/{productVariant}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

productVariant   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

product_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the products table. Example: omnis

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

barcode   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: zj

sku   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: hvoyhel

retail_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 60

wholesale_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 6

profit_margin   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 7

image   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: lotdhskljfikuavh

weight   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 66

dimensions   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: dsyuwkqgrgzhjubahgdrnpz

tax   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 19

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 79

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • discontinued
attributes   object[]  optional  
id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the product_variant_attributes table. Example: 12

attribute_id   string  optional  

This field is required when attributes is present. The id of an existing record in the attributes table.

attribute_value_id   string  optional  

This field is required when attributes is present. The id of an existing record in the attribute_values table.

stocks   object[]  optional  
id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the stocks table. Example: 14

warehouse_id   string  optional  

This field is required when stocks is present. The id of an existing record in the warehouses table.

quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 76

min_quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 3

cost   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 65

    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/delete" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"ids\": [
        1,
        2,
        5
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/product-variants/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "ids": [
        1,
        2,
        5
    ]
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.

إنشاء مستودع جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/warehouses" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مستودع جدة\",
    \"location\": \"xmljpgpakxzyfgfuxu\",
    \"description\": \"Et consequuntur autem quae.\",
    \"manager\": \"krjgirxwigcdyrhdyzypq\",
    \"capacity\": 79,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"is_default\": true,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"address\": \"شارع فلسطين\",
    \"active\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/warehouses"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "مستودع جدة",
    "location": "xmljpgpakxzyfgfuxu",
    "description": "Et consequuntur autem quae.",
    "manager": "krjgirxwigcdyrhdyzypq",
    "capacity": 79,
    "status": "inactive",
    "is_default": true,
    "company_id": 1,
    "address": "شارع فلسطين",
    "active": true
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

POST api/warehouses

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم المستودع. Example: مستودع جدة

location   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: xmljpgpakxzyfgfuxu

description   string  optional  

Example: Et consequuntur autem quae.

manager   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: krjgirxwigcdyrhdyzypq

capacity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 79

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
is_default   boolean  optional  

Example: true

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمسؤول العام فقط). Example: 1

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

address   string  optional  

عنوان المستودع. Example: شارع فلسطين

active   boolean  optional  

حالة المستودع. Example: true

عرض تفاصيل مستودع

    --get "http://localhost/api/warehouses/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/warehouses/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

تحديث بيانات مستودع

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/warehouses/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مستودع جدة الجديد\",
    \"location\": \"ejgkclel\",
    \"description\": \"Et totam necessitatibus quis perferendis provident necessitatibus occaecati.\",
    \"manager\": \"cbwmjoswimltd\",
    \"capacity\": 18,
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"is_default\": false,
    \"company_id\": 2,
    \"created_by\": \"in\",
    \"address\": \"شارع فلسطين، حي الجامعة\",
    \"active\": false
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/warehouses/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "مستودع جدة الجديد",
    "location": "ejgkclel",
    "description": "Et totam necessitatibus quis perferendis provident necessitatibus occaecati.",
    "manager": "cbwmjoswimltd",
    "capacity": 18,
    "status": "inactive",
    "is_default": false,
    "company_id": 2,
    "created_by": "in",
    "address": "شارع فلسطين، حي الجامعة",
    "active": false
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

إضافة حركة مخزون يدوية

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/stock" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"quantity\": 50,
    \"reserved\": 84,
    \"min_quantity\": 13,
    \"cost\": 68,
    \"batch\": \"mqkdxhdkaxdpicdc\",
    \"expiry\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"loc\": \"mgjrpnlvr\",
    \"status\": \"in\",
    \"variant_id\": 1,
    \"warehouse_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"eaque\",
    \"created_by\": \"esse\",
    \"notes\": \"رصيد افتتاحي\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/stock"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "quantity": 50,
    "reserved": 84,
    "min_quantity": 13,
    "cost": 68,
    "batch": "mqkdxhdkaxdpicdc",
    "expiry": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "loc": "mgjrpnlvr",
    "status": "in",
    "variant_id": 1,
    "warehouse_id": 1,
    "company_id": "eaque",
    "created_by": "esse",
    "notes": "رصيد افتتاحي"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/stock

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

quantity   number   

الكمية. Example: 50

reserved   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 84

min_quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 13

cost   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 68

batch   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: mqkdxhdkaxdpicdc

expiry   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

loc   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: mgjrpnlvr

status   string   

الحالة (in/out). Example: in

variant_id   integer   

معرف متغير المنتج. Example: 1

warehouse_id   integer   

معرف المستودع. Example: 1

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: eaque

created_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: esse

notes   string  optional  

ملاحظات إضافية. Example: رصيد افتتاحي

عرض تفاصيل حركة مخزون

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/stock/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/stock/{stock}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

stock   integer   

The stock. Example: 1

id   string   

معرف حركة المخزون. Example: 1

تحديث حركة مخزون

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"quantity\": 50,
    \"reserved\": 81,
    \"min_quantity\": 83,
    \"cost\": 82,
    \"batch\": \"jiwaghftebaxqludoavxl\",
    \"expiry\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"loc\": \"gyiyeqwkl\",
    \"status\": \"in\",
    \"variant_id\": 1,
    \"warehouse_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"et\",
    \"updated_by\": \"dolore\",
    \"notes\": \"تحديث الرصيد\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "quantity": 50,
    "reserved": 81,
    "min_quantity": 83,
    "cost": 82,
    "batch": "jiwaghftebaxqludoavxl",
    "expiry": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "loc": "gyiyeqwkl",
    "status": "in",
    "variant_id": 1,
    "warehouse_id": 1,
    "company_id": "et",
    "updated_by": "dolore",
    "notes": "تحديث الرصيد"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/stock/{stock}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

stock   integer   

The stock. Example: 1

id   string   

معرف حركة المخزون. Example: 1

Body Parameters

quantity   number  optional  

الكمية. Example: 50

reserved   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 81

min_quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 83

cost   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 82

batch   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: jiwaghftebaxqludoavxl

expiry   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

loc   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gyiyeqwkl

status   string  optional  

الحالة (in/out). Example: in

variant_id   integer  optional  

معرف متغير المنتج. Example: 1

warehouse_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستودع. Example: 1

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: et

updated_by   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: dolore

notes   string  optional  

ملاحظات إضافية. Example: تحديث الرصيد

حذف حركة مخزون

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/stock/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/stock/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/categories/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"qjkzijfonpyjkujdjfhv\",
    \"description\": \"Consequatur odit explicabo voluptas consequuntur quaerat et.\",
    \"active\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/categories/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "qjkzijfonpyjkujdjfhv",
    "description": "Consequatur odit explicabo voluptas consequuntur quaerat et.",
    "active": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

category   integer   

The category. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: qjkzijfonpyjkujdjfhv

description   string  optional  

Example: Consequatur odit explicabo voluptas consequuntur quaerat et.

parent_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the categories table.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

image_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

إضافة ماركة جديدة

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/brands" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"آبل\",
    \"description\": \"Soluta minus aut explicabo autem omnis cupiditate ipsa dolorem.\",
    \"active\": true,
    \"desc\": \"شركة تقنية عالمية\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/brands"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "آبل",
    "description": "Soluta minus aut explicabo autem omnis cupiditate ipsa dolorem.",
    "active": true,
    "desc": "شركة تقنية عالمية"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/brands

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم العلامة التجارية. Example: آبل

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

description   string  optional  

Example: Soluta minus aut explicabo autem omnis cupiditate ipsa dolorem.

image_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

desc   string  optional  

وصف الماركة. Example: شركة تقنية عالمية

    --get "http://localhost/api/brands/1" \

05. إدراة المستخدمين

إنشاء دور جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/roles" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Accountant\",
    \"company_ids\": [
        1
    ],
    \"permissions\": [
        \"users.view\",
        \"invoices.create\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Accountant",
    "company_ids": [
        1
    ],
    "permissions": [
        "users.view",
        "invoices.create"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/roles

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم الدور الفريد. Example: Accountant

company_ids   integer[]  optional  

مصفوفة الشركات المرتبطة.

permissions   string[]  optional  

مصفوفة مسميات الصلاحيات.

عرض تفاصيل دور

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/roles/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/roles/{role_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

role_id   integer   

The ID of the role. Example: 1

role   string   

معرف الدور. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات دور

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/roles/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Senior Accountant\",
    \"permissions\": [
        \"invoices.all\"
    ]
}"

    "http://localhost/api/roles/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Senior Accountant",
    "permissions": [
        "invoices.all"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/roles/{role_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

role_id   integer   

The ID of the role. Example: 1

role   string   

معرف الدور. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

اسم الدور. Example: Senior Accountant

permissions   string[]  optional  

تحديث قائمة الصلاحيات.

حذف دور واحد أو عدة أدوار (Single/Batch Delete)

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/roles/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/roles/{role_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

role_id   integer   

The ID of the role. Example: 1

role   integer  optional  

معرف الدور للحذف المفرد. Example: 1

Body Parameters

item_ids   integer[]  optional  

مصفوفة معرفات الأدوار للحذف الجماعي.

حذف دور واحد أو عدة أدوار (Single/Batch Delete)

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/roles/batch-delete" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles/batch-delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/roles/batch-delete

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

role   integer  optional  

معرف الدور للحذف المفرد. Example: 1

Body Parameters

item_ids   integer[]  optional  

مصفوفة معرفات الأدوار للحذف الجماعي.

تعيين أدوار لمستخدم

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/roles/assign" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"roles\": [
        \"admin\",
        \"editor\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles/assign"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "user_id": 1,
    "roles": [
        "admin",
        "editor"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/roles/assign

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

roles   string[]   

مصفوفة مسميات الأدوار.

05. التقارير المالية

تقرير التدفق النقدي تحليل الحركات المالية (إيداعات وسحوبات) خلال فترة زمنية محددة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=2023-10-31&company_id=12" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "2023-10-31",
    "company_id": "12",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/cash-flow

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2023-10-01

date_to   string  optional  

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: 2023-10-31

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة. Example: 12

التدفق النقدي حسب الخزنة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/by-cash-box?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=2023-10-31" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/by-cash-box"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "2023-10-31",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Headers

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2023-10-01

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: 2023-10-31

ملخص السيولة الحالية عرض أرصدة جميع الخزن وتصنيفاتها.

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/cash-flow/summary?company_id=20" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

05. التقارير والتحليلات

تقرير المبيعات العام توليد تقرير شامل للمبيعات مع إمكانية التجميع حسب (اليوم، الشهر، العميل، أو المنتج).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales?date_from=2024-01-01&date_to=voluptas&group_by=month&export=qui" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales"
);

const params = {
    "date_from": "2024-01-01",
    "date_to": "voluptas",
    "group_by": "month",
    "export": "qui",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/sales

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: 2024-01-01

date_to   string  optional  

date تاريخ النهاية. Example: voluptas

group_by   string  optional  

التجميع حسب (day, month, product, customer). Example: month

export   string  optional  

تصدير التقرير (excel, csv). Example: qui

المنتجات الأكثر مبيعاً عرض قائمة بالمنتجات الأعلى مبيعاً خلال فترة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-products?limit=10" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-products"
);

const params = {
    "limit": "10",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/sales/top-products

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

limit   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Example: 10

كبار العملاء عرض قائمة بالعملاء الأكثر شراءً.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/top-customers" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.

GET api/reports/sales/top-customers

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

اتجاهات المبيعات (Trend) تحليل حركة المبيعات بمرور الوقت (يومياً، أسبوعياً، أو شهرياً).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/trend?period=week" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/sales/trend"
);

const params = {
    "period": "week",
};

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

GET api/reports/sales/trend

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

period   string  optional  

نوع الفترة (day, week, month). Example: week

حركة المخزون تقرير مفصل عن عمليات الوارد والمنصرف لكل منتج ومستودع.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock?product_id=2&date_from=sapiente" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/reports/stock"
);

const params = {
    "product_id": "2",
    "date_from": "sapiente",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/reports/stock

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

product_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المنتج. Example: 2

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: sapiente

تقييم المخزون حساب القيمة المالية للمخزون الحالي بناءً على سعر التكلفة وسعر البيع.

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock/valuation" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \

    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/stock/low-stock?threshold=10" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

المنتجات الراكدة المنتجات التي لم يتم عليها أي حركة خلال فترة طويلة.

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \

ملخص الضريبة ملخص للضرائب المحصلة والمدفوعة وصافي الالتزام الضريبي.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/reports/tax?date_from=2023-10-01&date_to=id" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/reports/tax"
);

    "date_from": "2023-10-01",
    "date_to": "id",

مؤشرات لوحة التحكم (Dashboard) جلب الإحصائيات الحيوية للنظام (إجمالي المبيعات، نمو العملاء، المنتجات الأعلى مبيعاً) لعرضها في الشاشة الرئيسية.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/dashboard/summary" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/dashboard/summary"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/dashboard/summary

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

06. العمليات المالية والخزينة

تحويل الرصيد (Transfer) إجراء عملية تحويل رصيد من صندوق مستخدم إلى صندوق مستخدم آخر أو لنفس المستخدم في صندوق آخر.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/transfer" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"target_user_id\": 2,
    \"amount\": 100,
    \"from_cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"to_cash_box_id\": 2,
    \"description\": \"تحويل داخلي\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transfer"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "target_user_id": 2,
    "amount": 100,
    "from_cash_box_id": 1,
    "to_cash_box_id": 2,
    "description": "تحويل داخلي"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/transfer

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

target_user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم المستهدف. Example: 2

amount   number   

المبلغ. Example: 100

from_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف صندوق الصادر. Example: 1

to_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف صندوق الوارد. Example: 2

description   string  optional  

وصف المعاملة. Example: تحويل داخلي

إيداع نقدي (Deposit)

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/deposit" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 1000,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"إيداع رأس مال\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/deposit"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 1000,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "description": "إيداع رأس مال"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/deposit

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المودع. Example: 1000

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف الإيداع. Example: إيداع رأس مال

سحب نقدي (Withdraw)

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/withdraw" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 200,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"مصاريف نثرية\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/withdraw"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 200,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "description": "مصاريف نثرية"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/withdraw

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المسحوب. Example: 200

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف السحب. Example: مصاريف نثرية

عرض جميع المعاملات (للمدراء)

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/transactions?type=%D8%B3%D8%AD%D8%A8&user_id=1&cashbox_id=1&created_at_from=2023-01-01" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions"
);

const params = {
    "type": "سحب",
    "user_id": "1",
    "cashbox_id": "1",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/transactions

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

type   string  optional  

نوع المعاملة. Example: سحب

user_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستخدم. Example: 1

cashbox_id   integer  optional  

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

created_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

سجل عمليات المستخدم في خزنة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/transactions/user/1?type=%D8%A5%D9%8A%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%B9&created_at_from=2023-01-01&per_page=15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/user/1"
);

const params = {
    "type": "إيداع",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "per_page": "15",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

Request      

GET api/transactions/user/{cashBoxId?}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBoxId   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

Query Parameters

type   string  optional  

نوع العملية (إيداع، سحب، تحويل). Example: إيداع

created_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 20 Example: 15

عكس معاملة (Reverse) إلغاء معاملة سابقة وإرجاع الحالة كما كانت.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/nam/reverse" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/transactions/nam/reverse"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/transactions/{transaction}/reverse

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

transaction   string   

The transaction. Example: nam

transactionId   string   

المعرف الفريد للمعاملة (UUID). Example: 9abc-123...

عرض أنواع الخزن استرجاع أنواع الصناديق المالية (مثل: خزنة فرعية، حساب بنكي، عهدة موظف).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types?description=%D8%A8%D9%86%D9%83&is_default=1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types"
);

const params = {
    "description": "بنك",
    "is_default": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",
            "description": "خزنة مخصصة للدفع النقدي",
            "is_default": false,
            "is_system": false,
            "is_active": true,
            "image_url": null,
            "image_id": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "created_by": null,
            "creator_name": null,
            "cash_boxes_count": 94,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "نقدي",

            "is_default": false,
            "is_system": false,
            "is_active": true,
            "image_url": null,
            "image_id": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "created_by": null,
            "creator_name": null,
            "cash_boxes_count": 94,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49"

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

is_default   boolean  optional

إضافة نوع خزنة جديد

    "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"description\": \"نقدي\",
    \"is_default\": false
}"

    "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types"

حذف أنواع خزن (Batch Delete)

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-box-types/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

Example: 1

Body Parameters

مصفوفة المعرفات.

عرض قائمة الخزن

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes?current_user=1&name=%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AE%D8%B2%D9%86%D8%A9+%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B1%D8%A6%D9%8A%D8%B3%D9%8A%D8%A9&account_number=123456&created_at_from=2023-01-01&user_id=2&per_page=9" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes"
);

const params = {
    "current_user": "1",
    "name": "الخزنة الرئيسية",
    "account_number": "123456",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "user_id": "2",
    "per_page": "9",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "الخزنة النقدية",
            "balance": "0.00",
            "cash_type": "نقدي",
            "cash_box_type_id": 1,
            "user_id": 1,
            "created_by": 1,
            "company_id": 1,
            "is_default": 1,
            "is_active": true,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "الخزنة النقدية",
            "balance": "0.00",
            "cash_type": "نقدي",
            "cash_box_type_id": 1,
            "user_id": 1,
            "created_by": 1,
            "company_id": 1,
            "is_default": 1,
            "is_active": true,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09"
        }
    ]

Request      

GET api/cash-boxes

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

current_user   boolean  optional  

عرض الخزن المرتبطة بالمستخدم الحالي فقط. Example: true

name   string  optional  

البحث باسم الخزنة. Example: الخزنة الرئيسية

account_number   string  optional  

رقم الحساب. Example: 123456

created_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ الإنشاء من. Example: 2023-01-01

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة لصالح مستخدم معين. Example: 2

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 10 Example: 9

إنشاء خزنة جديدة

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"مكتب القاهرة\",
    \"balance\": 85,
    \"cash_box_type_id\": 1,
    \"is_default\": true,
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"Assumenda dolorum est in maiores.\",
    \"account_number\": \"ACC-001\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "مكتب القاهرة",
    "balance": 85,
    "cash_box_type_id": 1,
    "is_default": true,
    "user_id": 1,
    "company_id": 1,
    "description": "Assumenda dolorum est in maiores.",
    "account_number": "ACC-001"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/cash-boxes

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم الخزنة. Example: مكتب القاهرة

balance   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 85

cash_box_type_id   integer   

معرف نوع الصندوق. Example: 1

is_default   boolean  optional  

Example: true

user_id   integer  optional  

معرف المستخدم المسؤول عن الخزنة. Example: 1

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمسؤول فقط). Example: 1

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

description   string  optional  

Example: Assumenda dolorum est in maiores.

account_number   string  optional  

رقم الحساب المرتبط. Example: ACC-001

عرض تفاصيل خزنة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "data": {
        "id": 1,

        "user_id": 1,
        "created_by": 1,
        "company_id": 1,
        "is_default": 1,
        "is_active": true,
        "created_at": "2025-07-09",
        "updated_at": "2025-07-09"
