Request      

GET api/cash-boxes/{cashBox_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBox_id   integer   

The ID of the cashBox. Example: 1

cashBox   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

تحديث بيانات خزنة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"الخزنة الفرعية\",
    \"balance\": 75,
    \"is_default\": true,
    \"description\": \"Dolorem sunt ipsa itaque aut.\",
    \"account_number\": \"ron\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "الخزنة الفرعية",
    "balance": 75,
    "is_default": true,
    "description": "Dolorem sunt ipsa itaque aut.",
    "account_number": "ron"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

PUT api/cash-boxes/{cashBox_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBox_id   integer   

The ID of the cashBox. Example: 1

cashBox   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

اسم الخزنة المحدث. Example: الخزنة الفرعية

balance   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 75

cash_box_type_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_box_types table.

is_default   boolean  optional  

Example: true

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

description   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: Dolorem sunt ipsa itaque aut.

account_number   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: ron

حذف خزنة

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/cash-boxes/{cashBox_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

cashBox_id   integer   

The ID of the cashBox. Example: 1

cashBox   string   

معرف الخزنة. Example: 1

تحويل أرصدة بين الخزن

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/transfer" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 500.5,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"to_cash_box_id\": 2,
    \"to_user_id\": 1,
    \"description\": \"تحويل عهدة شهرية\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/cash-boxes/transfer"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 500.5,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "to_cash_box_id": 2,
    "to_user_id": 1,
    "description": "تحويل عهدة شهرية"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/cash-boxes/transfer

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

amount   number   

المبلغ المراد تحويله. Example: 500.5

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة المصدر. Example: 1

to_cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة الهدف. Example: 2

to_user_id   integer   

معرف المستخدم المستلم (يمكن أن يكون نفس المحول). Example: 1

description   string  optional  

وصف التحويل. Example: تحويل عهدة شهرية

عرض قائمة المدفوعات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/payments?user_id=1&payment_method_id=1&cash_box_id=1&amount_from=100&amount_to=1000&paid_at_from=2023-01-01&per_page=12" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payments"
);

const params = {
    "user_id": "1",
    "payment_method_id": "1",
    "cash_box_id": "1",
    "amount_from": "100",
    "amount_to": "1000",
    "paid_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "per_page": "12",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": null,
            "user_id": null,
            "payment_date": null,
            "amount": null,
            "method": null,
            "notes": null,
            "is_split": null,
            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        },
        {
            "id": null,
            "user_id": null,
            "payment_date": null,
            "amount": null,
            "method": null,
            "notes": null,
            "is_split": null,
            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/payments

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المستخدم. Example: 1

payment_method_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب طريقة الدفع. Example: 1

cash_box_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب الخزنة. Example: 1

amount_from   number  optional  

المبلغ من. Example: 100

amount_to   number  optional  

المبلغ إلى. Example: 1000

paid_at_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ الدفع من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 20 Example: 12

تسجيل دفعة جديدة

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/payments" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"user_id\": 1,
    \"payment_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"amount\": 1500.75,
    \"cash_amount\": 69,
    \"credit_amount\": 0,
    \"method\": \"alias\",
    \"notes\": \"دفعة مقدمة من الحساب\",
    \"is_split\": true,
    \"payment_method_id\": 1,
    \"cash_box_id\": 1,
    \"use_credit\": false,
    \"paid_at\": \"2023-05-20 14:30:00\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payments"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "user_id": 1,
    "payment_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "amount": 1500.75,
    "cash_amount": 69,
    "credit_amount": 0,
    "method": "alias",
    "notes": "دفعة مقدمة من الحساب",
    "is_split": true,
    "payment_method_id": 1,
    "cash_box_id": 1,
    "use_credit": false,
    "paid_at": "2023-05-20 14:30:00"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/payments

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

user_id   integer   

معرف العميل/المورد. Example: 1

payment_date   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

amount   number   

المبلغ المالي. Example: 1500.75

cash_amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 69

credit_amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 0

method   string  optional  

Example: alias

notes   string  optional  

ملاحظات إضافية. Example: دفعة مقدمة من الحساب

is_split   boolean  optional  

Example: true

payment_method_id   integer   

معرف طريقة الدفع. Example: 1

cash_box_id   integer   

معرف الخزنة المستلمة/الصادرة. Example: 1

invoice_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the invoices table.

use_credit   boolean  optional  

Example: false

paid_at   datetime  optional  

تاريخ وتوقيت الدفع. Example: 2023-05-20 14:30:00

عرض دفعة محددة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/payments/8" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payments/8"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers

content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

id   string

تحديث دفعة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/payments/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"payment_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"amount\": 2000,
    \"method\": \"laborum\",
    \"notes\": \"dolores\",
    \"is_split\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/payments/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "payment_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "amount": 2000,
    "method": "laborum",
    "notes": "dolores",
    "is_split": true
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

PUT api/payments/{payment}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

payment   integer   

The payment. Example: 1

id   string   

معرف الدفعة. Example: 1

Body Parameters

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

payment_date   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

amount   number  optional  

المبلغ الجديد. Example: 2000

method   string  optional  

Example: laborum

notes   string  optional  

Example: dolores

is_split   boolean  optional  

Example: true

payment_method_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the payment_methods table.

cash_box_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_boxes table.

عرض طرق الدفع المتاحة استرجاع كافة الوسائل المالية المقبولة في النظام (كاش، تحويل بنكي، محفظة إلكترونية).

    --get "http://localhost/api/payment-methods?active=1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/payment-methods"
);

    "active": "1",
};

    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "http://localhost/api/revenues" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"usqcdtjr\",
    \"source_id\": 12,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"amount\": 500,
    \"paid_amount\": 10,
    \"remaining_amount\": 3,
    \"payment_method\": \"zxgymcbxfzgntlw\",
    \"note\": \"elqkjjubqmwwarzzitbdhojoj\",
    \"revenue_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"description\": \"مبيعات خدمات فرعية\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/revenues"
);

};

Request      

POST api/revenues

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

source_type   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: usqcdtjr

source_id   integer   

Example: 12

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

wallet_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_boxes table.

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمدراء). Example: 1

amount   number   

المبلغ. Example: 500

paid_amount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 10

remaining_amount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 3

payment_method   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: zxgymcbxfzgntlw

note   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: elqkjjubqmwwarzzitbdhojoj

revenue_date   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

description   string   

وصف الإيراد. Example: مبيعات خدمات فرعية

عرض تفاصيل إيراد

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/revenues/14" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/revenues/14"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/revenues/{revenue_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

revenue_id   integer   

The ID of the revenue. Example: 14

revenue   string   

معرف الإيراد. Example: 1

تحديث إيراد

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/revenues/17" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"yerzgxglxnajvowrdu\",
    \"source_id\": 1,
    \"company_id\": \"qui\",
    \"amount\": 600,
    \"paid_amount\": 6,
    \"remaining_amount\": 47,
    \"payment_method\": \"tluykiecve\",
    \"note\": \"mhxqigvksodcvgorhzqgwblx\",
    \"revenue_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/revenues/17"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "source_type": "yerzgxglxnajvowrdu",
    "source_id": 1,
    "company_id": "qui",
    "amount": 600,
    "paid_amount": 6,
    "remaining_amount": 47,
    "payment_method": "tluykiecve",
    "note": "mhxqigvksodcvgorhzqgwblx",
    "revenue_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/revenues/{revenue_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

revenue_id   integer   

The ID of the revenue. Example: 17

revenue   string   

معرف الإيراد. Example: 1

Body Parameters

source_type   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: yerzgxglxnajvowrdu

source_id   integer   

Example: 1

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

wallet_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_boxes table.

company_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: qui

amount   number  optional  

المبلغ المحدث. Example: 600

paid_amount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 6

remaining_amount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 47

payment_method   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: tluykiecve

note   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: mhxqigvksodcvgorhzqgwblx

revenue_date   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

حذف إيراد

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/revenues/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/revenues/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/revenues/{revenue_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

revenue_id   integer   

The ID of the revenue. Example: 1

revenue   string   

معرف الإيراد. Example: 1

عرض قائمة الأرباح

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/profits?amount_from=50&amount_to=500&created_at_from=2023-01-01&per_page=13" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/profits"
);

const params = {
    "amount_from": "50",
    "amount_to": "500",
    "created_at_from": "2023-01-01",
    "per_page": "13",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": null,
            "source_type": null,
            "source_id": null,
            "created_by": null,
            "user_id": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "revenue_amount": null,
            "cost_amount": null,
            "profit_amount": null,
            "note": null,
            "profit_date": null,
            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        },
        {
            "id": null,
            "source_type": null,
            "source_id": null,
            "created_by": null,
            "user_id": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "revenue_amount": null,
            "cost_amount": null,
            "profit_amount": null,
            "note": null,
            "profit_date": null,
            "created_at": null,
            "updated_at": null
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/profits

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

amount_from   number  optional  

المبلغ من. Example: 50

amount_to   number  optional  

المبلغ إلى. Example: 500

created_at_from   string  optional  

date التاريخ من. Example: 2023-01-01

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج. Default: 15 Example: 13

تسجيل ربح جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/profits" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"gxrnwgcychxix\",
    \"source_id\": 8,
    \"company_id\": 1,
    \"revenue_amount\": 43,
    \"cost_amount\": 18,
    \"profit_amount\": 85,
    \"note\": \"bvgtaqoozecsgwceh\",
    \"profit_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:51\",
    \"amount\": 150,
    \"description\": \"عمولة مبيعات\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/profits"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "source_type": "gxrnwgcychxix",
    "source_id": 8,
    "company_id": 1,
    "revenue_amount": 43,
    "cost_amount": 18,
    "profit_amount": 85,
    "note": "bvgtaqoozecsgwceh",
    "profit_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:51",
    "amount": 150,
    "description": "عمولة مبيعات"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/profits

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

source_type   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gxrnwgcychxix

source_id   integer   

Example: 8

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

company_id   integer  optional  

معرف الشركة (للمدراء). Example: 1

revenue_amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 43

cost_amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 18

profit_amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 85

note   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: bvgtaqoozecsgwceh

profit_date   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:51

amount   number   

المبلغ. Example: 150

description   string   

وصف الربح. Example: عمولة مبيعات

عرض تفاصيل ربح

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/profits/5" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/profits/5"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "data": {
        "id": null,
        "source_type": null,
        "source_id": null,

        "cost_amount": null,
        "profit_amount": null,
        "note": null,
        "profit_date": null,
        "created_at": null,
        "updated_at": null

    "http://localhost/api/profits/5" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"source_type\": \"rkjlzh\",
    \"source_id\": 9,
    \"company_id\": \"ut\",
    \"revenue_amount\": 74,
    \"cost_amount\": 40,
    \"profit_amount\": 75,
    \"note\": \"xcrcaesfxfakbkmcjp\",
    \"profit_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:51\",
    \"amount\": 200
}"

    "http://localhost/api/profits/5"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "source_type": "rkjlzh",
    "source_id": 9,
    "company_id": "ut",
    "revenue_amount": 74,
    "cost_amount": 40,
    "profit_amount": 75,
    "note": "xcrcaesfxfakbkmcjp",
    "profit_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:51",

07. الإدارة وسجلات النظام

استعراض سجلات النشاط (Activity Log) تتبع عمليات الإنشاء والتعديل والحذف التي يقوم بها المستخدمون على النماذج المختلفة في النظام.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs?user_id=18&subject_type=molestias&action=qui&date_from=laudantium" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"subject_type\": \"omnis\",
    \"subject_id\": 19,
    \"action\": \"aliquam\",
    \"date_from\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:48\",
    \"date_to\": \"2078-03-09\",
    \"per_page\": 14,
    \"search\": \"voluptas\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs"
);

const params = {
    "user_id": "18",
    "subject_type": "molestias",
    "action": "qui",
    "date_from": "laudantium",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "subject_type": "omnis",
    "subject_id": 19,
    "action": "aliquam",
    "date_from": "2026-02-12T18:00:48",
    "date_to": "2078-03-09",
    "per_page": 14,
    "search": "voluptas"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المستخدم. Example: 18

subject_type   string  optional  

نوع النموذج (مثل Product, Invoice). Example: molestias

action   string  optional  

نوع العملية (created, updated, deleted). Example: qui

date_from   string  optional  

date تاريخ البداية. Example: laudantium

Body Parameters

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

subject_type   string  optional  

Example: omnis

subject_id   integer  optional  

Example: 19

action   string  optional  

Example: aliquam

date_from   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:48

date_to   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. يجب أن يكون value تاريخًا مطابقًا لـ date_from أو بعده. Example: 2078-03-09

per_page   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 10. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 14

search   string  optional  

Example: voluptas

عرض تفاصيل سجل نشاط

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/activity-logs/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   string   

معرف السجل. Example: 1

سجلات نشاط فاتورة محددة

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/invoice/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/invoice/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers

content-type: application/json

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

تصدير سجلات النشاط

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/export" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"date_from\": \"ea\",
    \"date_to\": \"quaerat\",
    \"format\": \"excel\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/activity-logs/export"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "date_from": "ea",
    "date_to": "quaerat",
    "format": "excel"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/activity-logs/export

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

date_from   date   

تاريخ البداية. Example: ea

date_to   date   

تاريخ النهاية. Example: quaerat

format   string  optional  

تنسيق الملف (csv, excel). Example: excel

عرض قائمة المستخدمين (عالمياً للسوبر أدمن، أو حسب الشركة للمديرين)

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/users" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/users"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/users

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

البحث عن مستخدم موجود مسبقاً في النظام (بناءً على الهاتف أو الإيميل)

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/users/lookup?phone=voluptatum&email=ghilpert%40example.net" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users/lookup"
);

const params = {
    "phone": "voluptatum",
    "email": "ghilpert@example.net",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/users/lookup

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

phone   string  optional  

رقم الهاتف للبحث. Example: voluptatum

email   string  optional  

البريد الإلكتروني للبحث. Example: ghilpert@example.net

إحصائيات المستخدمين

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/users/stats" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users/stats"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/users/stats

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

إضافة مستخدم جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/users" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"phone\": \"hic\",
    \"password\": \"^kuoOP\'`T>ZJ`#j\\\"`\",
    \"email\": \"duncan.thiel@example.com\",
    \"full_name\": \"memnfnwmjevydzmucvhdvyxvj\",
    \"nickname\": \"deleniti\",
    \"username\": \"llzniydunzsi\",
    \"position\": \"zorlqwnwshotksrnulustqkif\",
    \"settings\": \"[\\\"consequuntur\\\",\\\"repellendus\\\"]\",
    \"last_login_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:48\",
    \"email_verified_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:48\",
    \"type\": \"client\",
    \"balance\": 5665.52965,
    \"status\": \"active\",
    \"customer_type\": \"wholesale\",
    \"roles\": [
        \"perspiciatis\"
    ],
    \"permissions\": [
        \"facilis\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "phone": "hic",
    "password": "^kuoOP'`T>ZJ`#j\"`",
    "email": "duncan.thiel@example.com",
    "full_name": "memnfnwmjevydzmucvhdvyxvj",
    "nickname": "deleniti",
    "username": "llzniydunzsi",
    "position": "zorlqwnwshotksrnulustqkif",
    "settings": "[\"consequuntur\",\"repellendus\"]",
    "last_login_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:48",
    "email_verified_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:48",
    "type": "client",
    "balance": 5665.52965,
    "status": "active",
    "customer_type": "wholesale",
    "roles": [
        "perspiciatis"
    ],
    "permissions": [
        "facilis"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/users

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

phone   string   

رقم الهاتف. Example: hic

password   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون طول النص value على الأقل 8 حروف. Example: ^kuoOP'T>ZJ`#j"``

email   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون value عنوان بريد إلكتروني صحيحًا. Example: duncan.thiel@example.com

full_name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: memnfnwmjevydzmucvhdvyxvj

nickname   string  optional  

اللقب. Example: deleniti

username   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: llzniydunzsi

position   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: zorlqwnwshotksrnulustqkif

settings   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون الحقل value نصًا بتنسيق JSON صحيحًا. Example: ["consequuntur","repellendus"]

last_login_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:48

email_verified_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:48

type   string  optional  

Example: client

Must be one of:
  • system_owner
  • company_owner
  • sales
  • accounting
  • client
  • user
balance   number  optional  

Example: 5665.52965

images_ids   object  optional  
status   string  optional  

Example: active

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

company_ids   string[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

customer_type   string  optional  

Example: wholesale

Must be one of:
  • retail
  • wholesale
roles   string[]  optional  

The name of an existing record in the roles table.

permissions   string[]  optional  

The name of an existing record in the permissions table.

عرض تفاصيل مستخدم

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/users/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "System Owner",
        "nickname": "System Owner",
        "full_name": "Admin",
        "username": "system_owner",
        "email": "admin@admin.com",
        "phone": "1234567890",
        "balance": 0,
        "customer_type": null,
        "position": null,
        "status": "1",
        "avatar_url": null,
        "company_id": 2,
        "cash_box_id": 834,
        "last_login_at": null,
        "email_verified_at": null,
        "created_by": null,
        "companies": [],
        "created_at": "2025-07-09",
        "updated_at": "2026-02-09"
    }
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

تحديث بيانات مستخدم

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/users/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"full_name\": \"c\",
    \"nickname\": \"qfqxxyksoiwcexxytzkklg\",
    \"phone\": \"fgfq\",
    \"password\": \"i+PN]p\\\".WS80s[\",
    \"position\": \"iagqlftfrmvzatyqggrpsk\",
    \"settings\": \"[\\\"dolorem\\\",\\\"temporibus\\\"]\",
    \"balance\": 26.2,
    \"customer_type\": \"retail\",
    \"roles\": [
        \"quaerat\"
    ],
    \"permissions\": [
        \"quia\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/users/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "full_name": "c",
    "nickname": "qfqxxyksoiwcexxytzkklg",
    "phone": "fgfq",
    "password": "i+PN]p\".WS80s[",
    "position": "iagqlftfrmvzatyqggrpsk",
    "settings": "[\"dolorem\",\"temporibus\"]",
    "balance": 26.2,
    "customer_type": "retail",
    "roles": [
        "quaerat"
    ],
    "permissions": [
        "quia"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

تغيير الشركة النشطة

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/change-company/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"company_id\": 2
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/change-company/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "company_id": 2
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/users/delete" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"item_ids\": [
        2,
        3
    ]
}"

    "http://localhost/api/users/delete"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "item_ids": [
        2,
        3
    ]
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

POST api/users/delete

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept

Body Parameters

item_ids   integer[]   

مصفوفة المعرفات.

عرض قائمة الشركات

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/companies?per_page=15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/companies"
);

const params = {
    "per_page": "15",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

إضافة شركة جديدة

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/companies" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"شركة التقدم\",
    \"description\": \"Doloribus tempore dolorem ratione assumenda rerum eaque eos.\",
    \"field\": \"pijdghxetxlterybtcvjywhtw\",
    \"owner_name\": \"bgsullrhsxjrhdulgp\",
    \"address\": \"lwvdenazsudykfdacb\",
    \"phone\": \"lrxwen\",
    \"email\": \"lisandro.mosciski@example.com\",
    \"tax_number\": \"sdd\",
    \"website\": \"gcztofpxghivcrlwbzczdil\",
    \"created_by\": 12,
    \"company_id\": 17,
    \"images_ids\": [
        5
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/companies"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "شركة التقدم",
    "description": "Doloribus tempore dolorem ratione assumenda rerum eaque eos.",
    "field": "pijdghxetxlterybtcvjywhtw",
    "owner_name": "bgsullrhsxjrhdulgp",
    "address": "lwvdenazsudykfdacb",
    "phone": "lrxwen",
    "email": "lisandro.mosciski@example.com",
    "tax_number": "sdd",
    "website": "gcztofpxghivcrlwbzczdil",
    "created_by": 12,
    "company_id": 17,
    "images_ids": [
        5
    ]
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

POST api/companies

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

اسم الشركة. Example: شركة التقدم

description   string  optional  

Example: Doloribus tempore dolorem ratione assumenda rerum eaque eos.

field   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: pijdghxetxlterybtcvjywhtw

owner_name   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: bgsullrhsxjrhdulgp

address   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: lwvdenazsudykfdacb

phone   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 15 حرفًا. Example: lrxwen

email   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون value عنوان بريد إلكتروني صحيحًا. يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: lisandro.mosciski@example.com

tax_number   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: sdd

website   string  optional  

Must be a valid URL. يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gcztofpxghivcrlwbzczdil

settings   object  optional  
social_links   object  optional  
created_by   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: 12

company_id   integer  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table. Example: 17

images_ids   integer[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the images table.

    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

عرض سجلات التدقيق استرجاع سجلات العمليات المالية والإدارية الحساسة لغرض التدقيق والمراجعة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/logs?created_at_from=soluta&created_at_to=non" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/logs"
);

const params = {
    "created_at_from": "soluta",
    "created_at_to": "non",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/logs

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

created_at_from   string  optional  

date التاريخ من. Example: soluta

created_at_to   string  optional  

date التاريخ إلى. Example: non

التراجع عن عملية (Undo) إمكانية التراجع عن عملية حذف أو تعديل أو إضافة تمت من خلال سجل النشاط لاستعادة الحالة السابقة للبيانات.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/logs/est/undo" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/logs/est/undo"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/logs/{log}/undo

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

log   string   

The log. Example: est

logId   string   

معرف سجل النشاط المراد التراجع عنه. Example: 1

08. إعدادات النظام وتفضيلاته

عرض أنواع المستندات استرجاع أنواع المعاملات المالية المتاحة (فواتير مبيعات، مشتريات، مرتجعات، سندات قبص).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/invoice-types?context=ut" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types"
);

const params = {
    "context": "ut",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "فاتورة بيع بالتقسيط",
            "type": null,
            "description": "فاتورة بيع بالتقسيط (تستخدم لبيع المنتجات أو الخدمات مع جدول أقساط محدد، وتوليد سندات قبض/صرف مرتبطة بالأقساط، مع تحديث المخزون تلقائياً).",
            "code": "installment_sale",
            "context": "sales",
            "is_active": 1,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:50",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:50"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "فاتورة بيع بالتقسيط",
            "type": null,
            "description": "فاتورة بيع بالتقسيط (تستخدم لبيع المنتجات أو الخدمات مع جدول أقساط محدد، وتوليد سندات قبض/صرف مرتبطة بالأقساط، مع تحديث المخزون تلقائياً).",
            "code": "installment_sale",
            "context": "sales",
            "is_active": 1,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:50",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:50"
        }
    ]
}
Received response:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/invoice-types

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

context   string  optional  

سياق النوع (sale, purchase). Example: ut

إضافة نوع مستند جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"فاتورة مبيعات ضريبية\",
    \"description\": \"Asperiores corrupti qui distinctio perspiciatis ratione suscipit.\",
    \"code\": \"SALE_TAX\",
    \"context\": \"sale\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "فاتورة مبيعات ضريبية",
    "description": "Asperiores corrupti qui distinctio perspiciatis ratione suscipit.",
    "code": "SALE_TAX",
    "context": "sale"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/invoice-types

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

الاسم بالعربية. Example: فاتورة مبيعات ضريبية

description   string  optional  

Example: Asperiores corrupti qui distinctio perspiciatis ratione suscipit.

code   string   

كود فريد للنوع. Example: SALE_TAX

context   string   

السياق (sale/purchase). Example: sale

عرض قائمة الخدمات الإضافية استرجاع الخدمات غير المادية التي تقدمها الشركة (مثل: خدمات الشحن، الصيانة، التركيب).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/services?name=ut" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/services"
);

const params = {
    "name": "ut",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

    "data": [
        {
            "id": null,
            "name": null,

            "updated_at": null,
            "company_id": null,
            "created_by": null

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions"

    "plan_id": "16",

};

    method: "GET",

Request      

GET api/subscriptions

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب المستخدم. Example: 1

plan_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب الخطة. Example: 16

status   string  optional  

الحالة (active, expired). Example: quia

تسجيل اشتراك جديد

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"user_id\": \"qui\",
    \"service_id\": \"enim\",
    \"start_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"starts_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"next_billing_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"ends_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"billing_cycle\": \"veniam\",
    \"price\": 60,
    \"partial_payment\": 20211.177,
    \"status\": \"rerum\",
    \"unique_identifier\": \"tenetur\",
    \"auto_renew\": false,
    \"renewal_type\": \"fugiat\",
    \"notes\": \"quo\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "user_id": "qui",
    "service_id": "enim",
    "start_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "starts_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "next_billing_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "ends_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "billing_cycle": "veniam",
    "price": 60,
    "partial_payment": 20211.177,
    "status": "rerum",
    "unique_identifier": "tenetur",
    "auto_renew": false,
    "renewal_type": "fugiat",
    "notes": "quo"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

POST api/subscriptions

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

user_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the users table. Example: qui

service_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the services table. Example: enim

plan_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the plans table.

start_date   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

starts_at   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

next_billing_date   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

ends_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

billing_cycle   string   

Example: veniam

price   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 60

partial_payment   number  optional  

Example: 20211.177

status   string   

Example: rerum

unique_identifier   string  optional  

Example: tenetur

auto_renew   boolean  optional  

Example: false

renewal_type   string  optional  

Example: fugiat

notes   string  optional  

Example: quo

عرض خطط الأسعار استرجاع الباقات والخطط المتاحة للاشتراك في النظام.

    --get "http://localhost/api/plans" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/plans"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    "description": "Asperiores sunt laborum corporis pariatur voluptatem assumenda nihil.",
    "code": "SALE_TAX",

09. الأذونات والأمن

عرض قائمة الأدوار استرجاع كافة المجموعات (Roles) المعرفة في النظام (مثل: مدير، بائع، أمين مخزن).

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/roles?company_id=1&name=admin&per_page=-1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/roles"
);

const params = {
    "company_id": "1",
    "name": "admin",
    "per_page": "-1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "مدير شركة",
            "label": null,
            "description": null,
            "guard_name": "web",
            "permissions_count": 329,
            "users_count": 3,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49"
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "مدير شركة",
            "label": null,
            "description": null,
            "guard_name": "web",
            "permissions_count": 329,
            "users_count": 3,
            "created_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49",
            "updated_at": "2025-07-09 09:15:49"
        }
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/roles

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

company_id   integer  optional  

فلترة حسب الشركة. Example: 1

name   string  optional  

البحث باسم الدور. Example: admin

per_page   integer  optional  

عدد العناصر. Default: 10. Example: -1

استعراض مفاتيح الصلاحيات جلب جميع تعريفات الصلاحيات المتاحة في النظام من ملف الإعدادات.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/permissions" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/permissions"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/permissions

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

09. الإحصائيات والتقارير

APIs لوحة التحكم والإحصائيات المتقدمة للمنتجات والعملاء.

نظرة عامة على لوحة التحكم

requires authentication

جلب أرقام الأداء الرئيسية (إجمالي الإيرادات، الأرباح، عدد الطلبات) لليوم وللشهر الحالي.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/analytics/dashboard" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/analytics/dashboard"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/analytics/dashboard

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

المنتجات الأكثر مبيعاً

requires authentication

جلب قائمة بالمنتجات الأعلى أداءً بناءً على الكمية المباعة أو الأرباح المحققة.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/analytics/top-products?sort_by=distinctio&limit=6" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/analytics/top-products"
);

const params = {
    "sort_by": "distinctio",
    "limit": "6",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/analytics/top-products

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

sort_by   string  optional  

الحقل المراد الترتيب بناءً عليه (total_sold_quantity, total_profit, total_revenue). Default: total_sold_quantity. Example: distinctio

limit   integer  optional  

عدد النتائج المطلوبة. Default: 10. Example: 6

تاريخ مشتريات مستخدم محدد

requires authentication

جلب تفاصيل كافة المنتجات التي اشتراها مستخدم معين وإجمالي إنفاقه على كل منها.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/analytics/user-history/voluptatem" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/analytics/user-history/voluptatem"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:

Endpoints

تصحيح السجلات المفقودة للخزن الافتراضية

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/fix-missing-default-cashboxes" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/fix-missing-default-cashboxes"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "تمت عملية تصحيح السجلات القديمة بنجاح.",
    "boxes_created": 0,
    "note": "يرجى العلم أن هذا المسار مخفي من التوثيق ولأغراض الصيانة فقط."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example request:

    --get "http://localhost/api/media/view/#&quot;!" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/media/view/#&quot;!"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (404):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "The route api/media/view could not be found."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example: application/json

Update report status (Super Admin only).

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://localhost/api/error-reports/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"status\": \"in_review\",
    \"severity\": \"low\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/error-reports/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "status": "in_review",
    "severity": "low"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PATCH api/error-reports/{errorReport_id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

errorReport_id   integer   

The ID of the errorReport. Example: 1

Body Parameters

status   string   

Example: in_review

Must be one of:
  • pending
  • in_review
  • investigating
  • resolved
  • closed
  • ignored
severity   string  optional  

Example: low

Must be one of:
  • low
  • medium
  • high
  • critical

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Download a specific backup file.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/backups/voluptatibus/download" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/backups/voluptatibus/download"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/backups/{id}/download

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   string   

The ID of the backup. Example: voluptatibus

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

Request      

PUT api/backups/settings

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Restore from backup (High Security).

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/backups/quae/restore" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"token\": \"omnis\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/backups/quae/restore"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "token": "omnis"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/backups/{id}/restore

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   string   

The ID of the backup. Example: quae

Body Parameters

token   string   

Example: omnis

Example: 1

تحديث قيمة سمة.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/attribute-values/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"zhnznviptzjxnmgv\",
    \"color\": \"hehgxaunino\",
    \"attribute_id\": \"velit\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/attribute-values/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "zhnznviptzjxnmgv",
    "color": "hehgxaunino",
    "attribute_id": "velit"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

PUT api/attribute-values/{attributeValue}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

attributeValue   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: zhnznviptzjxnmgv

color   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: hehgxaunino

attribute_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the attributes table. Example: velit

created_by   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"kyllksiizqbzsjzpabijahgeo\",
    \"description\": \"Molestiae repellendus aut ex neque earum voluptatum.\",
    \"code\": \"u\",
    \"context\": \"ngpofw\",
    \"is_active\": false
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-types/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "kyllksiizqbzsjzpabijahgeo",
    "description": "Molestiae repellendus aut ex neque earum voluptatum.",
    "code": "u",
    "context": "ngpofw",
    "is_active": false
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

PUT api/invoice-types/{invoiceType}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

invoiceType   integer   

Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: kyllksiizqbzsjzpabijahgeo

description   string  optional  

Example: Molestiae repellendus aut ex neque earum voluptatum.

code   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: u

context   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: ngpofw

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: false

تخزين خدمة جديدة.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/services" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"fewgb\",
    \"description\": \"Et laboriosam qui maiores ipsum est.\",
    \"default_price\": 89
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/services"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "fewgb",
    "description": "Et laboriosam qui maiores ipsum est.",
    "default_price": 89
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/services

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: fewgb

description   string  optional  

Example: Et laboriosam qui maiores ipsum est.

default_price   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 89

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

عرض خدمة محددة.

    --get "http://localhost/api/services/15" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "message": "Unauthenticated."

Request      

GET api/subscriptions/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the subscription. Example: 18

تحديث اشتراك محدد.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/14" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"start_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"starts_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"next_billing_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"ends_at\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:50\",
    \"billing_cycle\": \"qui\",
    \"price\": 40,
    \"partial_payment\": 4597808.03030258,
    \"status\": \"quo\",
    \"unique_identifier\": \"praesentium\",
    \"auto_renew\": true,
    \"renewal_type\": \"non\",
    \"notes\": \"suscipit\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/14"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "start_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "starts_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "next_billing_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "ends_at": "2026-02-12T18:00:50",
    "billing_cycle": "qui",
    "price": 40,
    "partial_payment": 4597808.03030258,
    "status": "quo",
    "unique_identifier": "praesentium",
    "auto_renew": true,
    "renewal_type": "non",
    "notes": "suscipit"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/subscriptions/{id}

PATCH api/subscriptions/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the subscription. Example: 14

Body Parameters

user_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

service_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the services table.

plan_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the plans table.

start_date   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

starts_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

next_billing_date   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

ends_at   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:50

billing_cycle   string  optional  

Example: qui

price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 40

partial_payment   number  optional  

Example: 4597808.0303026

status   string  optional  

Example: quo

unique_identifier   string  optional  

Example: praesentium

auto_renew   boolean  optional  

Example: true

renewal_type   string  optional  

Example: non

notes   string  optional  

Example: suscipit

حذف اشتراك محدد.

    --header "Accept: application/json"

Renew subscription

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/12/renew" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"amount\": 51,
    \"notes\": \"atque\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/12/renew"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "amount": 51,
    "notes": "atque"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/subscriptions/{id}/renew

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the subscription. Example: 12

Body Parameters

amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 51

payment_method_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the payment_methods table.

cash_box_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the cash_boxes table.

notes   string  optional  

Example: atque

Get subscription payment history

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/1/history" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/subscriptions/1/history"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.
