Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the subscription. Example: 1

تخزين عنصر فاتورة جديد.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"invoice_id\": \"minus\",
    \"name\": \"ratione\",
    \"quantity\": 69,
    \"unit_price\": 68,
    \"discount\": 31,
    \"total\": 7
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "invoice_id": "minus",
    "name": "ratione",
    "quantity": 69,
    "unit_price": 68,
    "discount": 31,
    "total": 7
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/invoice-item

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

invoice_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the invoices table. Example: minus

name   string   

Example: ratione

quantity   integer   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 1. Example: 69

unit_price   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 68

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 31

total   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 7

product_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the products table.

    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"ex\",
    \"quantity\": 86,
    \"unit_price\": 65,
    \"discount\": 3,
    \"total\": 68
}"

    "http://localhost/api/invoice-item/1"
);

    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "ex",
    "quantity": 86,
    "unit_price": 65,
    "discount": 3,
    "total": 68
};

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 3

تخزين خطة جديدة.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/plans" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"ycxedtmvqtbeavfjo\",
    \"code\": \"gutjfzcdbxd\",
    \"description\": \"Quisquam soluta quis earum temporibus quo.\",
    \"price\": 4,
    \"currency\": \"ruvq\",
    \"duration\": 81,
    \"duration_unit\": \"dtsmgnob\",
    \"trial_days\": 89,
    \"is_active\": false,
    \"features\": \"[\\\"quidem\\\",\\\"recusandae\\\"]\",
    \"max_users\": 42,
    \"max_projects\": 11,
    \"max_storage_mb\": 40,
    \"type\": \"jotiazijdlthtwc\",
    \"icon\": \"rgmcxmprrgbjafyy\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "ycxedtmvqtbeavfjo",
    "code": "gutjfzcdbxd",
    "description": "Quisquam soluta quis earum temporibus quo.",
    "price": 4,
    "currency": "ruvq",
    "duration": 81,
    "duration_unit": "dtsmgnob",
    "trial_days": 89,
    "is_active": false,
    "features": "[\"quidem\",\"recusandae\"]",
    "max_users": 42,
    "max_projects": 11,
    "max_storage_mb": 40,
    "type": "jotiazijdlthtwc",
    "icon": "rgmcxmprrgbjafyy"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/plans

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: ycxedtmvqtbeavfjo

code   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: gutjfzcdbxd

description   string  optional  

Example: Quisquam soluta quis earum temporibus quo.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 4

currency   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 10 حرفًا. Example: ruvq

duration   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 1. Example: 81

duration_unit   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 20 حرفًا. Example: dtsmgnob

trial_days   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 89

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: false

features   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون الحقل value نصًا بتنسيق JSON صحيحًا. Example: ["quidem","recusandae"]

max_users   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 42

max_projects   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 11

max_storage_mb   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 40

type   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 50 حرفًا. Example: jotiazijdlthtwc

icon   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: rgmcxmprrgbjafyy

تحديث خطة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/plans/14" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"dpavqv\",
    \"code\": \"dojxltipflnsycfwlunnknjv\",
    \"description\": \"Aliquid debitis facere quidem ipsa ut.\",
    \"price\": 50,
    \"currency\": \"zzrenz\",
    \"duration\": 17,
    \"duration_unit\": \"ylq\",
    \"trial_days\": 71,
    \"is_active\": false,
    \"features\": \"[\\\"ut\\\",\\\"quae\\\"]\",
    \"max_users\": 74,
    \"max_projects\": 3,
    \"max_storage_mb\": 31,
    \"type\": \"pptewurvbdazrkgqztokfeec\",
    \"icon\": \"zbvkomzdyzpg\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans/14"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "dpavqv",
    "code": "dojxltipflnsycfwlunnknjv",
    "description": "Aliquid debitis facere quidem ipsa ut.",
    "price": 50,
    "currency": "zzrenz",
    "duration": 17,
    "duration_unit": "ylq",
    "trial_days": 71,
    "is_active": false,
    "features": "[\"ut\",\"quae\"]",
    "max_users": 74,
    "max_projects": 3,
    "max_storage_mb": 31,
    "type": "pptewurvbdazrkgqztokfeec",
    "icon": "zbvkomzdyzpg"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/plans/{id}

PATCH api/plans/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the plan. Example: 14

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: dpavqv

code   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: dojxltipflnsycfwlunnknjv

description   string  optional  

Example: Aliquid debitis facere quidem ipsa ut.

company_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the companies table.

price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 50

currency   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 10 حرفًا. Example: zzrenz

duration   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 1. Example: 17

duration_unit   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 20 حرفًا. Example: ylq

trial_days   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 71

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: false

features   string  optional  

يجب أن يكون الحقل value نصًا بتنسيق JSON صحيحًا. Example: ["ut","quae"]

max_users   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 74

max_projects   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 3

max_storage_mb   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 31

type   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 50 حرفًا. Example: pptewurvbdazrkgqztokfeec

icon   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: zbvkomzdyzpg

حذف خطة محددة.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://localhost/api/plans/12" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/plans/12"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/plans/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the plan. Example: 12

تخزين عنصر فاتورة جديد.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-items" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"invoice_id\": \"non\",
    \"name\": \"ipsum\",
    \"quantity\": 24,
    \"unit_price\": 30,
    \"discount\": 10,
    \"total\": 82
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-items"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "invoice_id": "non",
    "name": "ipsum",
    "quantity": 24,
    "unit_price": 30,
    "discount": 10,
    "total": 82
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/invoice-items

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

invoice_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the invoices table. Example: non

name   string   

Example: ipsum

quantity   integer   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 1. Example: 24

unit_price   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 30

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 10

total   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 82

product_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the products table.

    --get "http://localhost/api/invoice-items/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://localhost/api/invoice-items/1"
);

    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

تحديث عنصر فاتورة محدد.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-items/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"error\",
    \"quantity\": 88,
    \"unit_price\": 71,
    \"discount\": 53,
    \"total\": 37
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-items/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "error",
    "quantity": 88,
    "unit_price": 71,
    "discount": 53,
    "total": 37
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the invoice item. Example: 1

Body Parameters

invoice_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the invoices table.

name   string  optional  

Example: error

quantity   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 1. Example: 88

unit_price   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 71

discount   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 53

total   number  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. Example: 37

product_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the products table.

تحديث نوع فاتورة محدد.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"lkwyhbjqgun\",
    \"description\": \"Itaque consequatur et voluptatem velit.\",
    \"code\": \"runeeqcbdofgsurls\",
    \"context\": \"csluholjnstbp\",
    \"is_active\": false
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/invoice-type/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "lkwyhbjqgun",
    "description": "Itaque consequatur et voluptatem velit.",
    "code": "runeeqcbdofgsurls",
    "context": "csluholjnstbp",
    "is_active": false
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.

Request      

PUT api/invoice-type/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the invoice type. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: lkwyhbjqgun

description   string  optional  

Example: Itaque consequatur et voluptatem velit.

code   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: runeeqcbdofgsurls

context   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: csluholjnstbp

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: false

POST api/expenses

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/expenses" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"expense_category_id\": \"fugiat\",
    \"amount\": 46,
    \"expense_date\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:51\",
    \"notes\": \"odio\",
    \"reference_number\": \"dhoubhnlp\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/expenses"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "expense_category_id": "fugiat",
    "amount": 46,
    "expense_date": "2026-02-12T18:00:51",
    "notes": "odio",
    "reference_number": "dhoubhnlp"
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

POST api/expenses

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

expense_category_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the expense_categories table. Example: fugiat

amount   number   

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0.01. Example: 46

expense_date   string   

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:51

notes   string  optional  

Example: odio

reference_number   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 100 حرفًا. Example: dhoubhnlp

    \"reference_number\": \"tmfecgxmf\"
}"

Request      

GET api/tasks

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Store a newly created task in storage.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/tasks" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"title\": \"cu\",
    \"description\": \"Saepe quaerat sequi culpa beatae iste.\",
    \"priority\": \"medium\",
    \"deadline\": \"2026-02-12T18:00:51\",
    \"assignments\": []
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/tasks"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "title": "cu",
    "description": "Saepe quaerat sequi culpa beatae iste.",
    "priority": "medium",
    "deadline": "2026-02-12T18:00:51",
    "assignments": []
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/tasks

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

title   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: cu

description   string  optional  

Example: Saepe quaerat sequi culpa beatae iste.

priority   string   

Example: medium

Must be one of:
  • urgent
  • high
  • medium
  • low
deadline   string  optional  

الحقل value ليس تاريخًا صحيحًا. Example: 2026-02-12T18:00:51

assignments   object   

Display the specified task.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/tasks/8" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/8"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/tasks/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the task. Example: 8

Update the specified task status/progress.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/2" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"status\": \"cancelled\",
    \"progress\": 12,
    \"description\": \"Magnam occaecati assumenda facere natus dolorem cum consectetur quaerat.\",
    \"title\": \"dcqenoqibwtznortbvwmxbb\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/2"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "status": "cancelled",
    "progress": 12,
    "description": "Magnam occaecati assumenda facere natus dolorem cum consectetur quaerat.",
    "title": "dcqenoqibwtznortbvwmxbb"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/tasks/{id}

PATCH api/tasks/{id}

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the task. Example: 2

Body Parameters

status   string  optional  

Example: cancelled

Must be one of:
  • pending
  • doing
  • review
  • completed
  • cancelled
progress   integer  optional  

يجب أن تكون قيمة value على الأقل 0. يجب ألا تكون قيمة value أكبر من 100. Example: 12

description   string  optional  

Example: Magnam occaecati assumenda facere natus dolorem cum consectetur quaerat.

title   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: dcqenoqibwtznortbvwmxbb

Add a comment/activity to the task.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/9/comments" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"content\": \"voluptatum\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/9/comments"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "content": "voluptatum"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/tasks/{task_id}/comments

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

task_id   integer   

The ID of the task. Example: 9

Body Parameters

content   string   

Example: voluptatum

Upload an attachment to the task.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/20/attachments" \
    --header "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --form "file=@C:\Users\hesham-mohamed\AppData\Local\Temp\php6CFC.tmp" 
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/tasks/20/attachments"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

const body = new FormData();
body.append('file', document.querySelector('input[name="file"]').files[0]);

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body,
}).then(response => response.json());
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/tasks/{task_id}/attachments

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: multipart/form-data

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

task_id   integer   

The ID of the task. Example: 20

Body Parameters

file   file   

Must be a file. يجب ألا يتجاوز حجم الملف value 10240 كيلوبايت. Example: C:\Users\hesham-mohamed\AppData\Local\Temp\php6CFC.tmp

Store a new task group.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://localhost/api/task-groups" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"xmdxcmoprbkywyh\",
    \"description\": \"Quis est debitis ex reiciendis eum consequatur.\",
    \"color\": \"gxnujvvyvtyr\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/task-groups"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "xmdxcmoprbkywyh",
    "description": "Quis est debitis ex reiciendis eum consequatur.",
    "color": "gxnujvvyvtyr"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

Request      

POST api/task-groups

Headers

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 255 حرفًا. Example: xmdxcmoprbkywyh

description   string  optional  

Example: Quis est debitis ex reiciendis eum consequatur.

color   string  optional  

يجب ألا يتجاوز طول النص value 20 حرفًا. Example: gxnujvvyvtyr

user_ids   string[]  optional  

The id of an existing record in the users table.

Update an existing task group.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://localhost/api/task-groups/9" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"kowgzmsoyn\",
    \"description\": \"Inventore iusto voluptas porro aut saepe fuga enim.\",
    \"color\": \"bcuhneklesybqbdaeavf\"
}"

    "http://localhost/api/task-groups/9"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "name": "kowgzmsoyn",
    "description": "Inventore iusto voluptas porro aut saepe fuga enim.",
    "color": "bcuhneklesybqbdaeavf"
};

    method: "PUT",
    headers,

}).then(response => response.json());

GET api/php/migrate

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/php/migrate" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/php/migrate"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *

    "status": true,
    "message": "تم تنفيذ الميجريشن بنجاح لتحديث هيكل قاعدة البيانات.",
    "data": {
        "output": "\n   INFO  Nothing to migrate.  \n\r\n"
    },
    "total": 1
}

مسح جميع الكاشات وإعادة بنائها.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/php/clear" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/php/clear"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (200):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *
 

{
    "status": true,
    "message": "تم مسح جميع الكاشات وإعادة بنائها بنجاح.",
    "data": {
        "cache": "تم مسح الكاش",
        "config": "تم مسح وإعادة بناء كاش الإعدادات",
        "route": "تم مسح وإعادة بناء كاش المسارات",
        "view": "تم مسح كاش العروض",
        "compiled": "تم مسح الملفات المترجمة",
        "permissions": "تم مسح كاش صلاحيات Spatie (إذا كان موجودًا)"
    },
    "total": 6
}

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.

Authenticate the request for channel access.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://localhost/api/broadcasting/auth" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://localhost/api/broadcasting/auth"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
access-control-allow-origin: *

    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
